Alright. Is Rodimus already there and ready to defend? Also is he currently in any coversations or anything I should know about. I should be set to take him back when I know that stuff. Oh and whats the status of his family?

Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:                                  OOC: Welcome back.  I currently have Rodimus, I'll continue posting for him until you want him back.  We've started a Wiki project http://wikihost.org/wikis/nbwrpg_wiki/ 

Currently, a prison ship is struggling to maintain orbit, Hydras has sent Dinobot 2 to attack the Pasifcus base in Atlantis (and I was planning on having Rodimus help defend the city).   Some crazy bot is on the loose in Relay and is eating sparks.  And the Iron Skulls predecons are planning something evil... 


On 2/27/07, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:                                    Well recently I was contacted on my myspace about coming back to NBW and I think it's time I did.

I'm going to need a massive update on events. When I'm caught up I'll reclaim Rodimus. I think I'll stick with one char for now though. 

Hope to hear from you all soon.

~Robo
